hadiths.text: It was narrated from Anas:That the Messenger of Allah was treated by means of cupping when he was in Ihram on the top of the foot for contusion that he had suffered. (Daif)

chapter.ara-name: باب حِجَامَةِ الْمُحْرِمِ عَلَى ظَهْرِ الْقَدَمِ .
chapter.eng-name: Cupping The Muhrim On The Top Of the Foot
